high_descs: Walk to the black chairs ahead, take a right, take a right at the wall and face the small round table.
Turn on the lamp that;s on the round table.
Pick up the pen that's in front of the remote.
anns.task_desc: To turn on a lamp and pick up a pen.

high_descs: Take a step forward, turn right, go across the room, and turn right to face the lamp on a stool
Pick up the pencil from the stool
anns.task_desc: To turn on the lamp and pick a pencil up

high_descs: Walk forward to the black chair then turn right and walk to the wall thenturn right to face the lamp.
Pick up the pen that's near the base of the lamp.
anns.task_desc: Inspect a pen by lamp light,
